sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbackupresult ( backup_result_id , backup_opert_id , backup_file , sttus , error_info , execut_begin_tm , execut_end_tm , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #backupResultId# , #backupOpertId# , #backupFile# , #sttus# , #errorInfo# , #executBeginTm# , #executEndTm# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbackupresult SET backup_result_id = #backupResultId# , backup_opert_id = #backupOpertId# , backup_file = #backupFile# , sttus = #sttus# , error_info = #errorInfo# , execut_begin_tm = #executBeginTm# , execut_end_tm = #executEndTm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND backup_result_id = #backupResultId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnbackupresult WHERE 1 = 1 AND backup_result_id = #backupResultId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT backup_result_id , backup_opert_id , backup_file , sttus , error_info , execut_begin_tm , execut_end_tm , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNBACKUPRESULT WHERE backup_result_id = #backupResultId#

SELECT A.BACKUP_RESULT_ID , A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID , A.BACKUP_FILE , A.STTUS , A.ERROR_INFO , A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM , A.EXECUT_END_TM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT BACKUP_RESULT_ID , BACKUP_OPERT_ID , BACKUP_FILE , STTUS , ERROR_INFO , EXECUT_BEGIN_TM , EXECUT_END_TM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNBACKUPRESULT WHERE 1=1
BACKUP_RESULT_ID = #searchKeyword#
BACKUP_OPERT_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY BACKUP_RESULT_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNBACKUPRESULT WHERE 1=1
BACKUP_RESULT_ID = #searchKeyword#
BACKUP_OPERT_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
